entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Snow level 1500 metres. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
